description: Async Python client library for Unraid's official GraphQL API (v4.21.0+, Unraid 7.1.4+)
rules: Use async/await patterns - this is an async-first library
Use the UnraidClient as a context manager: async with UnraidClient(...) as client:
Always use GraphQL variables for parameters, never string interpolation
Handle exceptions using the UnraidAPIError hierarchy
Use Pydantic models from models.py for type-safe responses
